turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Numskulls.
turn.1: What happens in the end of The Numskulls' "Switch Off Alarm!"
turn.2: Brainy, in turn uses his intercom system to wake up all the other Numskulls and feeds the written message "Switch off alarm!" into the suggestion box.
turn.4: We then see "our Man" thinking "Noisy alarm!
turn.8: Where is it?" In the following panel we see Luggy informing Brainy that the alarm is still ringing whilst Brainy reads a print-out from the computer "Where is it?". It transpires that Blinky, who is in charge of the man's eyes, has neglected his duty by staying in bed.
turn.10: The other two Numskulls burst into his department and force him out of bed.
turn.11: What do they do to Blinky?
turn.12: Grumbling, Blinky opens the man's eyes with a hand-crank whilst Brainy and Luggy stow his bedding in cabinets under the eyes.
